abstract: The Facebook iPad app is a drastic improvement over the Web site because it is designed to make use of the touch screen and offers new features like locating friends on a map.
snippet: The Facebook iPad app is a drastic improvement over the Web site because it is designed to make use of the touch screen and offers new features like locating friends on a map.
lead_paragraph: Until now, navigating Facebook.com on an iPad felt like trying to write an e-mail on a calculator.

headline.main: Facebook iPad App Improves on Web Site
